description: Swap cabbage for brussels sprouts for an Irish mash with a difference.
keywords: Mash,Pescatarian,Brussels sprout,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Brussels Sprout Colcannon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5kg potatoes, peeled and chopped into cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the potatoes in a large pan of salted water for 15 minutes and drain using a slotted spoon, placing into a colander. Add the brussels sprouts to the pan and cook for 5 more minutes and drain.

Tip the potatoes back into the pan, add the butter and mash completely. Stir the brussels sprouts and spring onions and mix well. Season with salt and pepper and top with a knob of butter, if desired.
